name.name: ASHS: Automatic Segmentation of Hippocampal Subfields

software.description:
ASHS is a software package for automatic segmentation of hippocampal subfields in MRI scans. ASHS requires a T1-weighted scan and an oblique coronal T2-weighted scan with high in-plane resolution. ASHS will automatically label main hippocampal subfields and medial temporal lobe subregions. ASHS is easy to train for other brain segmentation applications as well.

For details, see the ASHS documentation: https://sites.google.com/site/hipposubfi...
software.maintainer: University of Pennsylvania Perelman School of Medicine
